articles.description: APPLE has confirmed that your MacBook battery life could increase dramatically with a simple switch away Google Chrome.
articles.content: Apple has unveiled the next-generation of its Mac operating system. Dubbed macOS 11.0 Big Sur, the new update brings an all-new colourful design inspired by iOS, an overhauled Messages app with MeMoj… [+1835 chars]
